Jobs.title: Principal Storage Architect
Jobs.description: ', "First member of a growing cross-functional storage team. The storage team designs, deploys and supports storage platforms to support LinkedIn's critical business and corporate IT systems. ", '*Major Projects: ', 'DMX4 to VMAX migration to enhance performance and ensure scalability, then implementation of a twin for DR', 'Data Warehouse storage re-design with focus on write optimization', 'DR site storage design, build out, bootstrap and failover; followed by migration to new cage of original DB/SAN infrastructure', 'Deploy new multisite backup to disk systems for production databases', 'Deployment of Cisco UCS and vSphere to support rapid provisioning of systems', '

Jobs.title: Senior Storage Engineer
Jobs.description: ', 'Recruited for expertise in EMC products and SAN design to be a member of an infrastructure design and tier-2 support team for worldwide storage and data protection operations. Transitioned to architectural team with responsibility for storage and data protection architecture, including technology selection, long-term strategy and future technology introduction.', '', 'Systems engineer, team trainer, and special advisor on 7-member team, with areas of responsibility including (1) production storage deployment of 200PB, (2) data protection systems moving ~2PB/day (3) capacity planning and storage design for new datacenters. Works independently to manage medium and long-term projects. Participate as part of multifunctional teams to introduce new storage architectures and technology.', '

Jobs.title: Enterprise Storage Architect
Jobs.description: ', 'Recruited as principal architect for design of long-term storage infrastructure, virtualization, and disaster recovery. Appointed to oversee all storage systems and Information Lifecycle Management program, developing solutions across three sites: Washington, DC, Northern Virginia, and Doha, Qatar.', '', 'Project manager, team trainer, and special counsel on 25-member team, managing $1 MM budget composed of three projects including (1) file and backup infrastructure, (2) disaster recovery co-location, and (3) SAN for new data center. Manage up to 8 personnel as matrix lead, conducting weekly storage and computer trainings.', '

Jobs.title: Storage Architect
Jobs.description: ', 'Recruited as lead expert and technical resource, charged with leading three member storage team and $1 MM budget. Manage day-to-day operations and long-term co-location storage and disaster recovery systems design. Led Windows, Unix, Database and Networking teams in development of comprehensive solutions in support of core products across two sites. Advised VMware implementation, Backup System Lifecycle, Standardized system builds, and Oracle RAC projects, including web content management system redesign and disaster recovery build-out.', '

Jobs.title: UNIX Engineer
Jobs.description: ', 'Recruited to support position and promoted through increasing responsibility to Server Support as fully functioning IT engineer. Engineering oversight of day-to-day multisite storage area network and backup system. Self-directed SAN engineer, managing multiple arrays at two sites and use planning for 2006 hardware lifecycle upgrade. Managed up to 4 interns.', '

Jobs.description: ', 'Completed lifecycle refresh of Citrix environment from Metaframe 1.8 to Metaframe XP', 'Part of a team to revamp Novell Netware farm providing file sharing to Medical School and various University departments', 'Redesigned backup system and deployed multi-site backups with immediate offsite tape capabilities via SAN over DWDM', 'Part of a team that designed and deployed BCP site 40 miles from Washington, DC', '

Jobs.title: Analyst, User Tech Support
